main event: A group of individuals spotted an unidentified flying object while driving on Washington Street in Methuen.
interesting points: The sighting occurred while they were on their way to pick up a friend for a basketball game., The object was large and had an odd shape that did not resemble any known aircraft., The car reportedly stalled and the lights and radio went off during the sighting., The witnesses felt frightened and confused about what they witnessed., The witness expressed disbelief about the reactions of people in automobiles until experiencing it themselves.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with an odd shape
witness description: a group of individuals going to a basketball game
